column3: It was  urged  before  us  that  after  opening  the  cellophane  bag  by

column2: untying its top, Rangajeewa had put it in his trouser pocket without retying
the knot. He has retied the top of the cellophane bag only at the point of its
sealing  at  the  PNB.  This  was  after  inspecting  two  houses  and  spending
several  hours  in  carrying  out  further  investigations.  Thus,
